12 template <typename T, int Dim=1>
13 class Vec: public DataBase {
14  V_OBJECT(Vec);
15 
16  static const int MaxDim = MaxDimension;
17  static_assert(Dim > 0, "only positive Dim allowed");
18  static_assert(Dim <= MaxDim, "Dim too large");
19 
20  public:
21  typedef DataBase Base;
22  typedef typename shm<T>::array array;
23  typedef T Scalar;
24  typedef VistleVector<Scalar,Dim> Vector;
25 
26  Vec(const Index size,
27  const Meta &meta=Meta());
28 
29  Index getSize() override {
30  return d()->x[0]->size();
31  }
32  Index getSize() const override {
33  return m_size;
34  }
35 
36  int dimension() const override {
37  return Dim;
38  }
39 
40  bool copyEntry(Index to, DataBase::const_ptr src, Index from) override;
41  void setValue(Index idx, int component, const double &value) override;
42  double value(Index idx, int c=0) const override;

45  void setSize(const Index size) override;
46  void applyDimensionHint(Object::const_ptr grid) override;
47  void setExact(bool exact) override;
48 
49  array &x(int c=0) { return *d()->x[c]; }
50  array &y() { assert(Dim > 1); return Dim>1 ? *d()->x[1] : x(); }
51  array &z() { assert(Dim > 2); return Dim>2 ? *d()->x[2] : x(); }
52  array &w() { assert(Dim > 3); return Dim>3 ? *d()->x[3] : x(); }
53 
54  const T *x(int c=0) const { return m_x[c]; }
55  const T *y() const { assert(Dim > 1); return Dim>1 ? m_x[1] : x(); }
56  const T *z() const { assert(Dim > 2); return Dim>2 ? m_x[2] : x(); }
57  const T *w() const { assert(Dim > 3); return Dim>3 ? m_x[3] : x(); }
58 
59  void updateInternals() override;
60  std::pair<Vector, Vector> getMinMax() const;
61 
62  private:
63  mutable const T *m_x[MaxDim];
64  mutable Index m_size;
65

68
